ProteinName	Large ribosomal subunit protein uL3 (60S ribosomal protein L3) (HIV-1 TAR RNA-binding protein B) (TARBP-B)

Length	403
Function	Component of the large ribosomal subunit (PubMed:12962325, PubMed:23636399, PubMed:32669547, PubMed:35674491). The ribosome is a large ribonucleoprotein complex responsible for the synthesis of proteins in the cell (PubMed:12962325, PubMed:23636399, PubMed:32669547).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Nucleolus; Cytoplasm

PTM	Acetylation:34,39,103,115,120,132,136,143,144,148,154,155,177,229,282,283,286,294,297,300,341,349,356,362,366,373,385,386,393;Methylation:19,115,148,154,193,224,268,282,294,312,334,341,349,356,362,366,373,385;Phosphorylation:7,13,54,65,189,265,291,304,307,350,370,371,372,381;SUMOylation:39,66,120,143,177,193,224,226,229,238,250,283,286,294,297,300,312,334,341,356,362,366,373,385,386,393,399;Ubiquitylation:30,39,50,66,103,115,120,143,154,155,177,193,224,226,229,250,272,286,294,297,300,312,334,341,349,356,362,366,373,385,386,393,399
